#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,b[2000099];
	long int i,j,maxx,count,ans,n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%ld",&n);
		maxx=0;
		ans=0;
		long int a;
		for(i=0;i<2000096;i++)
		b[i]=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%ld",&a);
			b[a]+=1;
			maxx=max(maxx,a);
		}
		//printf("maxx=%ld %d\n",maxx,b[96]);
		for(i=maxx;i>=1;i--)
		{
			count=0;
			for(j=i;j<=maxx;j+=i)
			{
				count+=b[j];
				//printf("j=%ld count=%ld\n",j,count);
				if(count>=2)
				break;
			}
			if(count>=2)
			{
				ans=i;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(ans)
		printf("%ld\n",ans);
		else
		printf("1\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
